m_displayName: SEASON - KERUBIM - Des de la chance

description.fr:
{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} et {LUCKvalue:cc,permil,+} de {%CRITICAL_HIT} de {Weapon:1028!} jusqu'à sa prochaine {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Les bonus disparaissent à la fin du tour si {Weapon:1028!} n'a pas attaqué ce tour.</rem>
description.en:
{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} and {LUCKvalue:cc,permil,+} of {%CRITICAL_HIT} to {Weapon:1028!} until his next {%AT}.
\---
<rem>The bonuses disappear at the end of the turn if {Weapon:1028!} didn't attack this turn.</rem>
description.es:
{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} y {LUCKvalue:cc,permil,+} de {%CRITICAL_HIT} de {Weapon:1028!} hasta su próximo {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Los bonus desaparecen al final del turno si {Weapon:1028!} no ha recibido ataque durante este turno.</rem>
description.de:
{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} und {LUCKvalue:cc,permil,+} auf {%CRITICAL_HIT} von {Weapon:1028!} bis zu seinem nächsten {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Die Boni verschwinden am Rundenende, wenn {Weapon:1028!} in dieser Runde nicht angegriffen hat.</rem>
description.pt:
{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} e {LUCKvalue:cc,permil,+} de {%CRITICAL_HIT} de {Weapon:1028!} até seu próximo {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Os bônus desaparecem no fim do turno se {Weapon:1028!} não atacar durante o turno.</rem>
